100m Gutermann Sew-all Thread 000 Black
DescriptionData.Description:
Buy 3 Gutterman Sew-all threads of the same size (any colour) and save 5%!

Buy 10 Gutterman Sew-all threads of the same size  (any colour) and save 10%!

Discount applied in your basket


Gutermann Sew-all thread is the most reliable of machine threads. It may be used on natural, blended and synthetic fabrics which makes it extremely versatile.

DescriptionData.Title: Wooden 2 Tier Luxury Cantilever Sewing Chest
DescriptionData.Description:
We love the quality of this sewing chest, the two tiers open up to reveal loads of storage space inside. The box is made form a dark wood. Perfect for any sewing enthusiast. Ideal for a present.
Dimensions: 38cm Width, 23cm Depth, 31cm Height.

DescriptionData.Title: Sew Sew Jumbo Sewing Basket
DescriptionData.Description:
A very pretty large sewing chest giving you room for plenty of sewing accessories and it's topped out of the brilliant print from Robert Kaufman from the Fox & The Houndstooth collection.
Why not treat somebody special to this, it will make an excellent gift. Or you could just treat yourself!
Dimensions: 40cm Width, 27cm Depth, 22cm Height.

DescriptionData.Title: Sheep Print Knitting Storage Bag
DescriptionData.Description:
If you love crafts then there is nothing better than a storage bag like this, made out of a entertaining sheep print, wooden handles and a sturdy construction will help make this last a lifetimes worth of knitting.
Why not treat somebody special to this, it will make an excellent gift. Or you could just treat yourself!
Size Width 36cm Depth 22cm Height 36cm With a clear sleeve for needle storage.

DescriptionData.Title: Night Owls Large Square Sewing Basket
DescriptionData.Description:
A very pretty large sewing basket giving you room for plenty of sewing accessories and it's topped out of the brilliant print from Timeless Treasures featuring owls.
Why not treat somebody special to this, it will make an excellent gift. Or you could just treat yourself!
Dimensions: 31cm Width, 31cm Depth, 18cm Height.

DescriptionData.Title: Handmade Twin Lid Sewing Case
DescriptionData.Description:
A stunning large sewing chest with two lids giving you room for plenty of sewing accessories and it is all upholstered in come gorgeous quality quilting cotton and finished with a wicker style binding and handle.
Why not treat somebody special to this, it will make an excellent gift. Or you could just treat yourself!

DescriptionData.Title: 14 Count Aida Needlecraft Fabric White 30cm x 45cm
DescriptionData.Description:
Needlecraft fabric, ideal for cross stitch and embroidery, white coloured 14 count Aida. 100% Cotton.
Available in a single pack with a piece of fabric 30cm x 45cm.

DescriptionData.Title: 14 Count Aida Needlecraft Fabric Cream 30cm x 45cm
DescriptionData.Description:
Needlecraft fabric, ideal for cross stitch and embroidery, cream coloured 14 count Aida. 100% Cotton.
Available in a single pack with a piece of fabric 30cm x 45cm.

DescriptionData.Title: Dressmakers Carbon Paper 23cm x 28cm - 5 Sheets
DescriptionData.Description: Each packet contains two sheets of white and one sheet of each of blue, red and yellow ideal for dressmaking and crafts.

DescriptionData.Title: Tracing Paper Plain 76cm x 102cm
DescriptionData.Description: Three large sheets of vegetable craft paper. Ideal for tracing patterns, for dressmaking and craft.

DMC Patch Tapestry Starter Kit
DescriptionData.Description:
DMC have put together a fun starter kit for tapestry. You can make yourself a 15cm square tapestry of a orange monster.
This kit contains: > Printed Canvas > DMC soft cotton thread > Tapestry needle > Easy to follow instructions
FINISHED SIZE: 15cm square (6")
DIFFICULTY: perfect for children, due to the sharp needle and the small parts it is not recommended for children under 3.

DescriptionData.Title: DMC Santa With Sleigh Counted Cross Stitch Kit
DescriptionData.Description:
DMC have put together a pretty cross stitch kit. You can make yourself a 15cm x 15cm a lovely Christmas Scene.
This kit contains: > 14 count Aida Fabric > DMC cotton threads > Cross stitch needle > Easy to follow instructions
FINISHED SIZE: 15cm x 15cm (6" x 6"),
DIFFICULTY: Moderate

DescriptionData.Title: DMC Snowman With Presents Counted Cross Stitch Kit
DescriptionData.Description:
DMC have put together a pretty cross stitch kit. You can make yourself a 15cm x 15cm cheery snowman image with presents, a lovely Christmas Scene.
This kit contains: > 14 count Aida Fabric > DMC cotton threads > Cross stitch needle > Easy to follow instructions
FINISHED SIZE: 15cm x 15cm (6" x 6"),
DIFFICULTY: Moderate

DescriptionData.Title: DMC Elegance Counted Cross Stitch Kit

This kit contains: > 14 count Aida Fabric > DMC cotton threads > Cross stitch needle > Easy to follow instructions
FINISHED SIZE: 25cm x 25cm (10" x 10"),
DIFFICULTY: for age 16+.

DescriptionData.Title: DMC Summer Swift Counted Cross Stitch Kit

This kit contains: > I14 count white aida fabric > DMC cotton threads > Cross stitch needle > Easy to follow instructions

DescriptionData.Title: DMC The Snowman Snowdog Bookmark Cross Stitch Kit
DescriptionData.Description:
Embroider this wonderful bookmark from the film "The Snowman"
This counted cross-stitch kit contains: > 16-count antique white aida fabric > embroidery thread > needle > Chart > Instructions
STITCHES: full cross-stitch
FINISHED SIZE: approx 2" x 6.5" (5 x 17cm)
DIFFICULTY: perfect for newbies
